'''1.19.4 Pre-release 3''' (known as '''1.19.4-pre3''' in the launcher) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.19.4]], released on March 1, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-19-4-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.19.4 Pre-Release 3|March 1, 2023}}</ref> which changes colors of [[potion]]s and [[tipped arrow]]s, adds the functionality to dump contents of dynamic textures, and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Effect]]s'''
* Changed colors of following effects, along with their [[potion]]s (all forms) and [[tipped arrow]]s:

=== General ===
'''[[Debug screen]]'''
* Pressing {{key|F3+S}} now dumps all [[dynamic textures]] (like atlases, maps, etc.) to {{samp|screenshots/debug/}}.

== Experimental ==
These changes only take effect when the 1.20 experimental data pack is enabled.

=== Changes ===
==== Items ====
'''[[Archer pottery shard]]'''
* Changed its pattern when applying on a [[decorated pot]] and its item texture.

==== General ====
'''[[Tag]]'''
* Changed {{cd|flower_pot}} in the {{cd|#flower_pots}} block tag to {{cd|potted_cherry_sapling}}.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.19.4 Pre-release 3
|;From released versions before 1.19
|148458|Ridable mobs aren't knocked back upon death.
|;From 1.19
|250486|Error saving GUI scale option when toggling fullscreen while fullscreen resolution is changed.
|;From 1.19.3
|258561|Endermen teleport away instead of taking damage from end crystal, TNT and wither skull explosions.
|259666|Reloading a resource pack that has a custom texture atlas for a second time causes severe FPS lag on the client.
|;dev
|260277|{{cd|d=and|potted_cherry_sapling|potted_torchflower}} not part of {{cd|#flower_pots}} block tag.
|260451|Inventory character with semi-transparent outer skin layer not rendered correctly when looking right.
|260456|Certain potions are still indistinguishable by color.
|260470|Endermen can't dodge arrows fired from a dispenser.
|260474|Players and mobs are no longer affected by knockback upon death.
|260501|Cannot delete previous snapshot world in launcher.
|260579|Crash when a guardian deals damage to itself after removing thorns from {{cd|avoids_guardian_thorns}}.
|260605|Repeating command block summoning piglins/villagers causes memory usage to constantly increase.
|;previous
|260627|Dolphins with passengers either accelerate to ludicrous speed or are immobilized completely.
}}</onlyinclude>
